trans-unit.source: Defines row-specific properties that apply to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 定義套用至的資料列特定屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: You must set a RowDefinition for each row in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定每個資料列的 RowDefinition <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: When you set a row-specific RowDefinition, you assign unique sizing properties to each row.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定資料列特定 RowDefinition 時，您會將唯一的調整大小屬性指派給每個資料列中。

trans-unit.source: To set a group of RowDefinition elements by using code, add the RowDefinition to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用程式碼，以設定一組 RowDefinition 項目，加入 RowDefinition <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The RowDefinition class exposes only height properties.
trans-unit.target: RowDefinition 類別會公開只有高度屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set width properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>的執行個體、</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>設定寬度屬性

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the calculated height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示之計算的高度的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the ActualHeight of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和所有的 ActualHeight<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the calculated height in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>導出的高度，以與裝置無關的像素表示。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref> element, or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> value of a row that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的導出的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>項目或設定<xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>所定義的資料列值的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> is <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>為<xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>。</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> </xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the Height value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於高度值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> that represents the height of the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> ，代表資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示的最大高度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the MaxHeight value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您在相同的程式碼範例中，使用這些值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>值優先於 MaxHeight 值，這又會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or - ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字串表示法值等於或大於`0.0034`但等於或小於`160000`。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`（預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in`英吋; 1in = = 96px`cm`是公釐。 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`點; 1pt==(96/72) px # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the maximum height.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的最大高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum allowable height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示的最小允許高度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the MinHeight value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這些值在相同的程式碼範例時，MinHeight 值優先順序高於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>值接著會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增或移除資料列或資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>項目和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>項目會變成零，直到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or - ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字串表示法值等於或大於`0.0034`但等於或小於`160000`。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 不合格的值是以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值 （如上所述），(excepting `Auto`) 後面接著一個下列單元規範︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`（預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in`英吋; 1in = = 96px`cm`是公釐。 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`點; 1pt==(96/72) px # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the minimum allowable height.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>代表最小允許高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the offset value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個位移的值<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset of the row.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示資料列位移。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。
